output.sentences: As the day came to a close, people started arriving for the celebration.
All the women were in great costumes.
We watched the parade, thought it was a bit strange.
We were walking the streets, which had all sorts of costumes, including skeletons.
We saw a lot of the individuals riding the subway home.
